en: This process ensures the integrity of your Keystone device and firmware.
cn: 通过设备验证功能，可以校验您的设备是否被篡改过；也可以用来校验固件的完整性。

en: Visit our website and click #F5870A Start Verification# button.
cn: 访问我们的网站，然后单击＃F5870A 设备验证＃按钮。

en: Scan the QR code displayed on the website to get your device verification code.
cn: 使用设备扫描“设备验证”页面上显示的二维码后，会在设备上显示验证码。

en: Enter the code on the website to check for any potential tampering with your device.
cn: 在“设备验证”页面上输入验证码，检查您的设备是否被篡改。

en: Enter this code on Keystone's official website to verify your device's security.
cn: 在“设备验证”页面上输入验证码，检查您的设备是否安全。
未经授权的违规尝试检测到！

en:
Your device may have been compromised, posing a risk to your sensitive data and digital assets.
For your safety, we recommend erasing all personal data and contacting Keystone Support team immediately for assistance.
cn:
您的设备存在潜在篡改可能，这将会对您的隐私数据和数字资产造成威胁。
为了您的资产安全，我们建议您删除所有个人数据，并立即与Keystone支持团队联系以寻求帮助。

Korean: “Unauthorized breach attempt detected!”页面底部的按钮，新补充上的
cn: 删除数据 & 关闭设备

en: To unlock the newest features, please update your firmware to the latest version.
cn: 如需体验最新功能，请下载最新固件！

en: Ensure that your Keystone has at least 20% battery life remaining.
cn: 请确保您的设备电量高于20%。

en: Go to Keystone's firmware update page using your computer or smartphone.
cn: 使用计算机或智能手机转到Keystone的固件更新页面。

en: Connect your Keystone to your computer using a USB-C cable.
cn: 使用USB-C线缆将设备连接至计算机。

en: Click the #F5870A Install Update# button on the webpage and follow the instructions to install the latest firmware.
cn: 单击“WebUSB 固件升级”页面上的＃F5870A 开始连接＃按钮，然后根据提示安装最新的固件。

en: Do not unplug the USB cable while the installation process is underway.
Once connected, the external device will gain permission to transfer data to your Keystone.
cn: 连接后，外部设备将获得将数据传输到Keystone的权限。

en: The device needs a minimum of 20% battery life to continue the process.
Korean: "USB Update" 页面弹窗下的按钮，新补充上的
cn: 固件升级需要确保设备至少有 20% 以上的电量。

Korean: "USB Update" 页面弹窗下的按钮，新补充上的

en: Do not disconnect the USB cable during the installation process.
Ensure that your Keystone has at least 20% battery life remaining.
cn: 请确保您的设备电量高于20%。

en: Go to Keystone's firmware update page using your computer or smartphone.
cn: 使用电脑或手机访问Keystone的“固件更新”页面。

en: Transfer the firmware file (keystone3.bin) to your Keystone using a MicroSD card formatted in FAT32.
cn: 将固件（keystone3.bin）下载到 FAT32 格式的 microSD 卡内，插入到设备中。

en: Tap the #F5870A Update# button below to initiate the process.
cn: 点击下方的＃F5870A 更新＃按钮，开始升级。

en: Please ensure that your MicroSD card is formatted in FAT32 and contains the firmware 'keystone3.bin'.
cn: 请确保您的 microSD 卡为 FAT32 格式，并包含固件“ keystone3.bin”。

en: Do not remove the MicroSD Card while the update is underway.
cn: 升级过程中，请勿移除 microSD 卡。

en: A new firmware version is available. Do you want to update your device's firmware to the new version?
cn: 检测到新固件。是否将设备的固件更新为新版本？

en: Please ensure that you have properly inserted the MicroSD Card.
cn: 请确保您已正确插入了microSD卡。

en: Your device firmware version is higher than or equal to the one on your microSD card.
cn: 设备当前版本已高于或等于 microSD 卡上的固件版本。

en: You need to unlock your device to upgrade the firmware version.
cn: 您需要解锁设备以升级固件版本。

en: The device needs a minimum of 20% battery life to continue the process.
cn: 请确保您的设备电量高于20%。

en: Create a new wallet or import an existing wallet with the seed phrase.
cn: 创建一个新的钱包或用助记词导入现有的钱包。

en: The PIN code will be used to unlock your wallet and authorize transactions.
cn: 使用 PIN 码解锁您的钱包并授权交易。

en: The password will be used to unlock your wallet and authorize transactions.
cn: 使用 PIN 码解锁您的钱包并授权交易。

en: Password must be at least 6 characters
cn: 密码必须至少 6 个字符

en: Double confirm the PIN code you've entered.
cn: 再次确认您输入的 PIN 码。

en: Double confirm the password you've entered.
cn: 再次确认您输入的密码。

en: Name your wallet and select an icon to make it easily distinguishable.
cn: 给您的钱包设置名字，并选择一个图标以使其易于区分。

en: Pick an icon for your wallet
Select the preferred method for backing up your seed phrase.
cn: 推荐使用这种方法来备份助记词。

en: 12 or 24 seed phrase backup. Most commonly used method.
cn: 12或24个助记词备份，通常也是最常用的方法。

en: An advanced procedure for securely storing your seed phrase.

The Shamir Backup method provides a highly secure way to recover a seed phrase. It involves splitting the seed phrase into multiple fragments and specifying the required number of fragments needed to restore the phrase.
cn: 分片助记词方法提供了一种高度安全的方法来备份助记词。它将助记词分成多个片段，并指定恢复助记词所需的片段数量。

en: Never share your seed phrase with anyone else, as it grants access to your assets.
cn: 拥有您的助记词就可以访问您的资产，因此切勿与他人分享您的助记词。

en:
Ensure there are no onlookers or cameras when recording your seed phrase.
Please complete the setup process in one go to avoid any security risks.
cn: 请确保在没有旁观者或摄像头的环境下备份您的助记词！

en: Regenerate a new set of Seed Phrase?
Write down your seed phrase and store it in a secure location.
cn: 写下您的助记词，然后将其存放在安全的地方。

en: Select the words below in the correct order to validate your seed phrase.
cn: 按顺序选择以下单词以验证您所保存的助记词。

en: The seed phrase is incorrect. Please re-verify and try again.
cn: 助记词不匹配，请重新验证。

en: The device needs a minimum of 20% battery life to continue the process
cn: 请确保您的设备电量高于20%。
创建钱包中，保持设备为开启状态......

en: Please confirm you are the custodian of the Share #F5870A 1#
cn: 请确认您是该分片的持有者＃F5870A 1＃

en: Never share your seed phrase with anyone else, as it grants access to your assets.
cn: 拥有您的助记词就可以访问您的资产，因此切勿与他人分享您的助记词。

en:
Ensure there are no onlookers or cameras when recording your seed phrase.
Please complete the setup process in one go to avoid any security risks.
cn: 请确保在没有旁观者或摄像头的环境下备份您的助记词！

en: Write down your Share #F5870A 1# phrase and keep it properly.
cn: 写下您的分片＃F5870A 1＃部分的助记词，并妥善保存。

en: Select the words below in the correct order of your Share 1 phrase to validate your seed phrase.
cn: 按顺序选择以下单词，已验证您保存了当前分片的助记词。

en: The seed phrase for this Share has been validated, please proceed to the next Share.
cn: 该分片对应的助记词已成功验证，请进入下一分片助记词的备份。

en: Tap the button below and hand the Keystone over to the custodian of Share 2.
cn: 点击下面的按钮，然后将 Keystone 交给分片 2 的托管人。

en: The seed phrase is incorrect. Please re-verify and try again.
cn: 助记词不正确，请重新尝试。

en: If you cancel, any confirmed Shares will be lost.
cn: 如果取消，之前输入的分片助记词将不会被保存。

en:
Please confirm you are the custodian of the
Share #F5870A %d#
cn: 请确认您是分片 #F5870A %d# 的托管人。

en: Write down your Share #F5870A %d# phrase and keep it properly.
cn: 写下您分片 #F5870A %d# 的助记词，并妥善保管。

en: Select the words below in the correct order of your Share #F5870A %d# phrase to validate your seed phrase.
cn: 按照正确顺序选择分片 #F5870A %d# 的助记词，已验证您保存了当前分片的助记词。

en: Enter your seed phrase in the blanks provided below.
cn: 输入助记词当下列方框内。

cn: 您输入的助记词无效。请检查您所备份的助记词，重新尝试。

en: Recover your wallet with the specific seed phrase. Please complete the setup process in one go to avoid any security risks.
cn: 选择特定的助记词类型来恢复钱包。请一次完成设置过程，以避免任何安全风险。

en:
You'll need a 12/18/24 seed phrase
to recover your wallet
cn: 您需要使用 12/18/24 字的助记词来恢复钱包。

en:
You'll need a couple of seed phrase
shares to recover your wallet
cn: 您需要多个分片助记词来恢复您的钱包。

en: The phrase you typed is invalid. Please check your backup and try again
cn: 您输入的助记词无效。请检查您所备份的助记词，重新尝试。

en: Enter your  #F5870A %d#-word seed phrase for Share #F5870A %d# in the blanks provided below.
cn: 请将您分片#F5870A %d# 的助记词输入到下列空白框内。

en: The Share entered has already been previously inputted. Please submit a different Share.
cn: 该分片已经被倒入过，请输入其他分片助记词。

en: The Share you've entered doesn't correspond to this backup. Please re-verify your backup and try again.
cn: 您输入的助记词与该钱包不匹配。请检查您所备份的助记词，重新尝试。

en: Upon cancellation, you will be required to re-enter all the Shares again.
cn: 一旦取消，您需要再次输入所有的分片助记词才能进入。

en: You’ve already checked this share, please use another share to continue.
cn: 该分片已验证通过，请继续输入下一分片的助记词。

en: This share of your seed phrase matches your wallet.
cn: 您的助记词与您的钱包相匹配。

en: Scan the QR code with your software wallet
cn: 使用软件钱包扫描该二维码

en: Select networks you’d like to manage in the software wallet
cn: 选择您想在软件钱包中管理的网络

en: Scan the QR code with your software wallet
cn: 使用软件钱包扫描该二维码

cn: 选择要在软件钱包中显示的网络。

en: Please upgrade to the latest version for access to expanded software wallet compatibility.
cn: 请升级到最新版本，以体验最新兼容的软件钱包。

cn: 使用 Keystone 扫描二维码

en: Scan the QR code via Eternl wallet

en: %s Wallet wants to get your public key on your Keystone:

cn: 选择要用于比特币的地址类型

en: Modern format, lower fees, starts with "bc1q."
cn: 当前主流的地址类型，交易费较低，地址以“ bc1”开头。

en: Legacy & SegWit compatible, medium fees, starts with "3."
cn: 兼容 “Legacy” 和 “Segwit” 地址类型，交易费中等，地址以“ 3”开头。

en: Original format, higher fees, starts with "1."
cn: 最初的比特币地址格式，交易费较高，地址以“ 1”开头。

en: Taproot: Enhanced privacy and efficiency, starts with "bc1p."
Select the derivation path you’d like to use for Ethereum
cn: 选择以太坊地址的衍生路径
默认路径，遵循 BIP44，广泛使用。
Ledger 对应的以太坊地址路径。
较老的 Ledger 地址衍生路径，不常用。

en: Select the derivation path you’d like to use for Solana
cn: 选择要用于 Solana 的推导路径

en: Select the derivation path you’d like to use for Near
cn: 选择 Near 的衍生路径

en: Recommended. Widely adopted across numerous NEAR wallets.
cn: 推荐路径，被许多 Near 钱包采用。

en: Position your finger on the sensor and lift it up once you sense the vibration.
cn: 将手指放在传感器上，感觉到振动后抬起手指。

en: Failed to add fingerprint, please use another finger and try again
cn: 无法添加指纹，请使用另一根手指

en: Duplicate finger, please use a different finger
cn: 重复指纹，请尝试使用其他手指

en: You can add up to 3 fingerprints
cn: 您最多可以添加 3 个指纹

en: Now we need you to enter your passcode to encrypt and store the fingerprint.
cn: 请输入设备密码来加密存储您的指纹。

en: Do you really want to delete Finger %d?
This PIN code will be used to unlock your wallet and authorize transactions.
cn: 此PIN码将用于解锁您的钱包以及签署交易。

en: If forgotten, you'll have to verify the seed phrase for this wallet to reset the passcode.
cn: 如果您忘记了密码，则需要通过验证您的助记词来重置密码。

en: Double confirm the PIN code you've entered.

cn: 重置中，保持设备开启状态......

en: Your passcode has been reset successfully.
Create a passphrase shortcut for device boot-up
cn: 开启后将会在设备重启后展示密语钱包快捷入口
输入长度不能超过128个字符

en: A passphrase offers an extra level of security to your current seed phrase.
cn: 密语钱包为您的设备提供了额外的安全保障；

en: Each unique passphrase generates a different wallet.
cn:
每个唯一的密码子都会产生不同的钱包。
密语不同，则生成的密语钱包不同；

en: To recover your wallet, both the passphrase and seed phrase are required.
cn: 想要进入同一密语钱包，请确保您的助记词和密语都是正确的。

en: Forgetting the passphrase can result in the loss of access to your digital assets.
cn: 如果您将资产存储在密语钱包内，忘记密语会让您无法找回资产。

en: Now we need you to enter your passcode to setup passphrase wallet.
cn: 现在，请输入设备密码来设置密语钱包。

en: Enter your seed phrase to verify if it matches your current wallet.
cn: 输入您的助记词以验证它是否与当前钱包匹配。

en: Your seed has been validated and successfully verified.
The seed phrase is incorrect. Please re-verify and try again.
cn: 助记词不正确，请重新尝试。

en: Fingerprint Not Saved. Upon cancellation, you will be required to re-enter your fingerprint.
cn: 指纹未保存。取消后，您将需要重新输入指纹。

en: Keystone supports a maximum of #F5870A 3# different wallets.
cn: Keystone 最多支持管理＃F5870A 3＃个不同的钱包。

en: You should set a #F5870A different passcode# for each wallet
cn: 您应该为每个钱包设置＃F5870A 不同的密码＃

en: To switch wallets, unlock the device with the specific passcode associated with each one. The wallet list will not be displayed for enhanced security.
cn: 请输入正确的密码来解锁对应钱包；出于安全考虑，设备内不会展示已导入的钱包列表。

en: To safeguard your digital assets, it is advisable to verify the seed phrase before proceeding with its deletion.
cn: 为了保护您的资产安全，建议在删除钱包之前验证您是否已备份该助记词。

en: By proceeding, all data on this device, including all your wallets, will be permanently deleted.
cn: 通过程序，将永久删除此设备上的所有数据，包括所有钱包。

en: Please confirm that continuing will permanently delete all data, including wallets, on this device.
cn: 一旦确认，设备上的所有数据，包括您的钱包信息，都会在设备上被彻底擦除。

en: Please do not turn off your device during the wiping process.
cn: 请勿在擦除设备途中关闭设备。

en: When disabled, the usb can only be used for charging battery
cn: 禁用后，USB接口将仅用于充电

en: Please upgrade to the latest version for access to expanded crypto compatibility.
cn: 请升级到最新版本，以访问更多加密货币。

en: This address is exclusively for BTC transactions only. Sending other types of digital assets to this address will result in their loss.
cn: 此地址仅用于BTC交易。将其他类型的数字资产发送到此地址将会导致资产丢失。

en: What are the three different address formats for BTC?
cn: BTC的三种不同地址格式是什么？

en:
Bitcoin (BTC) uses three address formats for receiving funds:
1. Native SegWit is the most efficient and secure Bitcoin address format. It provides cost savings and improved security compared to other traditional address formats, typically starting with "bc1"
2. Legacy format is one of the earliest versions of Bitcoin, typically starting with "1"
3. Nested SegWit is a solution designed to facilitate the transition to Native SegWit in a smooth manner, typically starting with "3"
cn:
比特币（BTC）的三种地址格式：
1. Native SegWit 是当前主流的地址类型，交易费较低，地址以“ bc1”开头。
2. Nested SegWit 兼容 “Legacy” 和 “Segwit” 地址类型，交易费中等，地址以“ 3”开头。
3. Legacy 属于最初的比特币地址格式，交易费较高，地址以“ 1”开头。

en: What are the three different address formats for BTC?
cn: 比特币的三种不同地址格式是什么？

en: Can the three different address formats be used to transfer funds to each other?
cn: 这三种不同的地址格式可以相互接受资产吗？

en:
Yes, the three distinct Bitcoin address formats can be used for transferring funds among each other. However, it’s important to keep in mind the following aspects:
1. Differing transaction fees: The choice of address format can influence transaction fees, with Native SegWit addresses generally having lower fees.
2. Wallet and exchange compatibility: Make sure that the wallet or exchange you are using supports your chosen address format. Some wallets may only be compatible with specific address formats.
cn:
是的，三种不同的比特币地址格式可用于彼此转移资金。但是，请务必牢记以下方面：
1.交易费不同：选择不同的地址格式会产生不同的交易费。通常 Native Segwit 的交易费较低。
2.钱包或交易所的兼容性：请确保您使用的钱包或交易所支持您选择的地址格式。某些钱包可能仅支持特定地址格式。

en: Can the three different address formats be used to transfer funds to each other?
cn: 这三种不同的地址格式可以相互接受资产吗？
不重复使用同一地址的好处

en:
1. Privacy: Reusing addresses increases transaction traceability, endangering privacy. New addresses help maintain transaction privacy.
2. Transaction Efficiency: Multiple UTXOs linked to one address can raise costs for consolidation, impacting wallet efficiency.
In short, not reusing addresses safeguards privacy, optimizes transactions, and reduces security risks within the UTXO model.
cn:
1.隐私：重复使用同一地址增加了交易可追溯性，容易暴露隐私。每笔交易使用新地址有利于保持您的隐私。
2.交易效率：链接到一个地址的多个UTXO会提高整合成本，从而影响转账速度。
简而言之，不重复使用同一地址有利于保障隐私、优化交易速度。
不重复使用同一地址的好处

en: This address is only for ETH and EVM ERC-20 tokens, other digital assets sent to this address will be lost.
cn: 此地址仅适用于 ETH、ERC-20 代币或者 EVM 兼容链上的资产，将其他数字货币发送到该地址将会造成丢失。

en: Select the derivation path you’d like to use for Ethereum
cn: 选择要用于以太坊的推导路径

en: Recommend. Most commonly used in many software wallets.
cn: 推荐。常用于许多软件钱包中。

en: Select this path for Ledger Live asset management.
cn: 如需管理Ledger Live下的资产，则选择该路径。

en: Select this path for Ledger Legacy asset management.
cn: 如需管理 Ledger Legacy 下的资产，则选择该路径。

en: Exploring Differences: Standard, Ledger Live, and Legacy Derivation Paths in Ethereum
cn: 了解以太坊中的标准路径、Ledger Live和Ledger Legacy的派生路径

en:
1. Standard Path: This path is widely employed by numerous software wallets for address generation. Examples of such wallets encompass MetaMask, Rabby, BitKeep, and Core Wallet.
2. Ledger Live: Choose this path if you intend to import a seed phrase from Ledger Live. Please note that Keystone supports synchronizing only the initial 10 addresses using this format.
3. Ledger Legacy: Transition to this path if you manage your digital assets with Ledger Legacy
cn:
1.标准路径：此路径被许多软件钱包广泛用于地址生成，比如 Metamask，Rabby，Bitkeep和Core Wallet。
2. Ledger Live：如果您曾在Ledger Live下管理您的资产，请选择此派生路径。请注意，Keystone 仅支持此路径下的前10个地址。
3. Ledger Legacy：如果您曾在Ledger Legacy下管理您的资产，请选择此派生路径。

en: Exploring Differences: Standard, Ledger Live, and Legacy Derivation Paths in Ethereum
cn: 了解以太坊中的标准路径、Ledger Live和Ledger Legacy的派生路径

en: This address is only for TRX, TRC-20 tokens and TRC-10 tokens, other digital assets sent to this address will be lost.
cn: 此地址仅适用于TRX，TRC-20和TRC-10代币，将其他数字货币发送到该地址将会造成丢失。

en: This address is only for %s, other digital assets sent to this address will be lost.
cn: 此地址仅适用于％s，将其他数字货币发送到该地址将会造成丢失。
了解 Solana 的各派生路径

en:
1. Account-based Path: Widely adopted across numerous Solana wallets. An example of such a wallet is Solflare.
2. Single Account Path: Choose this path if you intend to import a seed phrase from Sollet / MathWallet. Please note that Keystone supports synchronizing only the initial 10 addresses using this format.
3. Sub-account Path: Transition to this path if you manage your digital assets with software wallets like Phantom / Exodus.
cn:
1. Account-based 路径：被许多 Solana 钱包采用，比如 Solflare。
2. Single Account 路径：如果您将 Sollet 或者 MathWallet钱包的助记词导入到 Keystone，则选择此路径。请注意，Keystone 仅支持此路径下的前10个地址。
3. Sub-account 路径：如果您将 Phantom 或者 Exodus 钱包的助记词导入到 Keystone，则选择此路径。

en: On the Cardano blockchain, we provide 24 accounts, and each account can generate numerous addresses for your use. You can easily switch between the accounts you need.
cn: 在Cardano区块链上，我们提供了24个ADA帐户，每个帐户都可以生成无数新地址。您可以在所需帐户之间轻松切换。

en: Key Concepts in Cardano's ADA Addresses
cn: Cardano 地址中的关键概念

en:
1. Payment & Stake Keys: In Cardano, every account has a Payment Key for regular ADA transactions (sending and receiving) and a Stake Key for staking and receiving rewards.
2. Base Address: A Base Address is derived from both the Payment Key and Stake Key. It can be used for both regular transactions and staking. Also known as "External Addresses (Delegated)."
3. Enterprise Address: This address only contains the Payment Key and is used solely for regular transactions, not for staking. It's designed for "business" scenarios that don't involve staking, like exchanges. Also known as "External Addresses (Not Delegated)."
4. Stake & Reward Addresses: The Stake Key is used for staking, and the associated Stake Address is also called a Reward Address, used to receive staking rewards.
cn:
1. Payment & Stake Keys：在Cardano中，每个帐户都有一个发送或接收常规ADA交易的付款密钥（Payment Key），以及用于积分和获得奖励的质押密钥（Stake Key）。
2. Base Address：基本地址（Base Address）是由付款密钥和股份密钥派生而来。它可以用于常规交易和质押，也被称为“外部地址（External Addresses）”。
3. Enterprise Address：此地址仅包含付款密钥，仅用于常规交易，而不是用于质押。它是为不涉及既有既定的“业务”场景而设计的，例如交流。也称为“外部地址（未授权）”。
4. Stake & Reward Addresses：质押密钥（Stake Key）用于质押；与之相关的质押地址（Stake Addresses）也被称为奖励地址（Reward Addresses），用于接收质押奖励。

en: Key Concepts in Cardano's ADA Addresses
cn: Cardano 地址中的关键概念

en: BTC transactions, based on the UTXO mechanism, allocate some assets to a change address during transfers. This address is generated by the software wallet for anonymity and privacy purposes. You don't need to worry since the change address belongs to your own account, and its amount will be used automatically in subsequent transactions.
cn: 比特币的交易是基于UTXO机制的，在交易时部分资产会被转移至您的找零地址上。该地址是由软件钱包生成的，出于匿名和隐私目的。您无需担心，因为找零地址也属于您本身帐户的一部分，其金额会在随后的交易中自动使用。

en: QR code data not recognized. Please try again.
cn: 二维码无法识别，请重试。

en: The transaction does not belong to the current wallet. Please ensure you are using the correct wallet to authorize the transaction.
cn: 该交易与当前钱包无关。请确保您正在使用正确的钱包来授权交易。

en: Keystone cannot facilitate transaction signing for the current address path. Please try again using a different address path.
cn: Keystone无法为当前地址路径的交易签名。请使用其他地址路径后重试。

en: If the verification fails again, the fingerprint signing for transactions will automatically be disabled.
cn: 如果验证再次失败，则指纹签名的功能将自动失效。

en: Rabby Wallet wants to connect your Keystone via USB
Your software wallet wants to connect to your device via USB
cn: 您的软件钱包希望通过USB连接到您的设备

en: View transaction details at your software wallet
cn: 在您的软件钱包中查看交易详细信息
使用 PIN码 或指纹

en: Too many unsuccessful attempts. Please enter your passcode
cn: 验证失败次数过多，请输入您的密码
使用 PIN码 或指纹

en: Device lock imminent. Please unlock to access the device.
cn: 设备锁即将锁定，请解锁以访问设备。
密码不正确，剩下 ％d 次尝试
密码不正确，剩下 ％d 的尝试

en: You must wipe you device to continue. Once wiped, all data stored on this device will be erased.
cn: 您必须擦除设备继续。擦除后，将删除所有存储在此设备上的数据。

en: Please unlock your device in #F55831 %d# minutes
cn: 请在 #F55831 %d# 分钟后解锁您的设备

en: Please unlock your device in #F55831 %d# minutes. One more incorrect attempt, your device will be locked.
cn: 请在 #F55831 %d# 分钟后解锁您的设备。如果再次解锁失败，您的设备将被锁定。

en: Please unlock your device in #F55831 1# minute
cn: 请在 #F55831 1#  分钟后解锁您的设备

en: Verify the seed phrase associated with this wallet to reset the passcode.
cn: 验证与此钱包相关的助记词以重置密码。

en: The seed phrase you've entered is invalid. Please re-verify your backup and try again.
cn: 您输入的助记词无效。请检查您所备份的助记词，重新尝试。

en: This phrase you typed is already used in a wallet account, please import another set of seed phrase.
cn: 该助记词已存在于设备上，请导入另一组助记词。

en: The device needs a minimum of 20% battery life to continue the process.
cn: 请确保您的设备电量高于20%。

en: The seed phrase is incorrect. Please re-verify and try again.
cn: 助记词不正确，请重新尝试。

en: The device has encountered an unknown issue and is currently unavailable. To resolve this, please wipe and restart the device. If the problem persists, please contact our support team.
cn: 该设备遇到了一个未知的问题，目前不可用。要解决此问题，请擦除并重新启动设备。如果问题仍然存在，请联系我们的支持团队。

en: Please ensure that your MicroSD card is formatted in FAT32 and contains the firmware 'keystone3.bin'.
cn: 请确保您的 microSD卡已被格式化为FAT32格式，并包含固件包“keystone3.bin”。

en: Your system log has been successfully exported to the MicroSD Card.
cn: 您的系统日志已成功导出到microSD卡。

en: Please ensure you've inserted a MicroSD Card formatted in FAT32.
cn: 请确保您插入了FAT32格式的microSD卡。

en: Please make sure your MicroSD card has enough memory.
cn: 请确保您的microSD卡具有足够的内存。

en: This is an advanced feature for developers to verify that the firmware running on your Keystone device is consistent with the one we open-sourced.
cn: 这是一个高级功能，用于开发人员验证在Keystone设备上运行的固件是否与我们开源的固件相一致。

en: Go to Keystone's open-sourced GitHub repo and follow the instructions to build your firmware and get the checksum.
cn: 进入Keystone的开源GitHub页面，并按照说明进行构建固件并计算对应校验和。

en: Click the #F5870A Checksum# button next to the firmware download.
cn: 点击固件页面中，“固件下载”按钮旁的 #F5870A Checksum#。

en: Tap the #F5870A Show Checksum# button below and compare the string with the one you got in the second step.
cn: 点击下面的 #F5870A Show Checksum# 按钮，然后将第二步的校验和与之进行对比。

en: If the above information matches the checksum in your self-built mh1903.bin, it means that our open-source firmware is consistent with the firmware in your device.
cn: 如果以上信息与您自行计算的 mh1903.bin 文件的校验和匹配，则意味着我们的开源固件与设备中的固件一致。

en: This is an optional feature to further enhance security. Compare the following checksum with the checksum of your download package on the official website, ensure that they are consistent.
cn: 这是一个可选的功能，可以进一步提高安全性。将以下校验和在官方网站上的下载软件包的校验和签到，请确保它们保持一致。

en: To access the full version of the TERMS OF USE, please visit the following link:
cn: 要访问使用条款的完整版本，请访问以下链接：

en: You must be 18 years old or above to access and use our Products or Services.
cn: 您必须年满18岁才能访问和使用我们的产品或服务。

en: Our hardware wallet securely manages cryptocurrencies.
cn: 我们的硬件钱包安全地管理加密货币。

en: We do not store your sensitive information like passwords or seed phrases. Keep your credentials safe.
cn: 我们不存储您的敏感信息，例如密码或助记词。保持您的凭据安全。

en: Be aware of the risks associated with cryptocurrencies and technology vulnerabilities.
cn: 请注意与加密货币和技术漏洞相关的风险。

en: Our Products and Services are protected by intellectual property laws.
cn: 我们的产品和服务受知识产权法保护。

en: You are responsible for your actions while using the Products and Services.
cn: 在使用产品和服务时，您应对自己的行动负责。

en: You must be 18 years old or above to access and use our Products or Services.
cn: 您必须年满18岁才能访问和使用我们的产品或服务。

en: We may modify or discontinue our services. Remember to back up your seed phrase to access your cryptocurrencies.
cn: 我们可能会修改或停止我们的服务。请务必备份您的助记词以访问您的加密货币。

en: The information provided is not financial advice. Seek professional advice before making any decisions.
cn: 提供的信息不是财务建议。在做出任何决定之前，请寻求专业建议。

en: The Terms are governed by Hong Kong SAR laws, and any dispute must be filed within one year.
cn: 该条款受香港法律管辖，任何争议都必须在一年内提出。

en: If you have any questions or concerns, please email us at support@keyst.one.
cn: 如果您有任何疑问或疑虑，请给我们发送电子邮件至support@keyst.one。

en: We reserve the right to change these Terms at our discretion.
cn: 我们保留酌情决定更改这些条款的权利。

en: When disabled, the usb can only be used for charging battery
cn: 禁用后，USB接口将仅用于充电

en: Password must be at least 6 characters
Duplicate PIN code detected. Please use a different one.
cn: 检测到重复的PIN码。请设置新PIN码。

en: Too many attempts. Please enter your passcode to unlock the device.
cn: 尝试次数过多。请输入您的密码以解锁设备。

en: Scan the QR code with your software wallet
cn: 用您的软件钱包扫描二维码

en: A physical attack has been detected, leading to the complete erasure of all data stored on this device. As a result, this device is now inoperable.
cn: 已经检测到了物理攻击，因此设备上存储的所有数据已被清除。当前的设备现在无法使用。
检测到的新区块链支持

en: Select the Entropy you’d like to use for creating wallets

cn: 使用Keystone 安全芯片的熵
骰子掷出来的数作为熵

en: Create your seed phrase from the keystone SEs’ true random number generator.
cn: 从Keystone 安全芯片的真实随机数发生器创建助记词。

en: Create your seed Phrase with random numbers generated by rolling dice.
cn: 用骰子生成的随机数创建助记词。

en: You need to roll at least #F5870A 50 times# to generate a seed phrase, and it is recommended roll more than #F5870A 99 times# for sufficient randomness.
cn: 您需要至少掷 #F5870A 50 次# 骰子来生成一组助记词。建议掷#F5870A 99 次#以上，以获得足够的随机性。

en: We recommended you use casino dice to increase the entropy of each dice throw.
cn: 建议使用赌场级别的骰子以确保随机性。

en: Entropy is a measure of randomness. In cryptography, it ensures that things like passwords or keys are unpredictable, making them more secure.
cn: 熵是随机性的量度。在密码学中，它可以确保密码或钥匙之类的东西不可预测，从而使其更加安全。

en: Why use Dice Rolls as your entropy?
cn: 为什么要使用骰子数作为您的熵？

en: Computers aren't great at being truly random. Dice rolls provide a physical, unpredictable source of randomness. By using them, you enhance the security of cryptographic processes, making it harder for someone to predict or crack your codes.
cn: 计算机并不是真正随机的。骰子数是不可预测的随机性来源。通过使用它们，您可以增强加密过程的安全性，从而使某人更难预测或破解您的代码。

en: Why use Dice Rolls as your entropy?
cn: 为什么要使用骰子数作为您的熵？

en: If you cancel, any numbers you entered will be lost.
cn: 如果取消，输入的任何数字将丢失。
